String.Dest: You don't want any part of this, Falmer!

String.Source: Curse you!
String.Dest: 诅咒你！

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: Is that the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了？

String.Source: Easily blocked!
String.Dest: 很容易堵住！

String.Source: That's a man's block right there!
String.Dest: 这是男人的气魄！

String.Source: Pathetic! Absolutely pathetic!
String.Dest: Pathetic! Absolutely pathetic!

String.Source: Were you trying to hit me? Because it doesn't look like you did!
String.Dest: 你是想揍我？因为一切都不随你的意！

String.Source: Ha! I love a challenge! Too bad you don't qualify!
String.Dest: Ha! I love a challenge! Too bad you don't qualify!

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: Why won't you die already!
String.Dest: 你怎么还没死！

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: Be grateful you get to die at my hands!
String.Dest: 死在我手下是你的荣幸！

String.Source: I'm stronger than I look, and I look pretty good!
String.Dest: I'm stronger than I look, and I look pretty good!

String.Source: Pray to Stendarr while you still can!
String.Dest: Pray to Stendarr while you still can!

String.Source: I'll skin you alive!
String.Dest: 我会活剥了你！

String.Source: You call yourself a Nord! You fight like a bloody Breton!
String.Dest: 你说你自己是诺德人！但你打起架来就像个嗜血的布莱顿人一样！

String.Source: Come on, let's dance!
String.Dest: 来吧，咱们跳舞！

String.Source: You made the wrong choice today!
String.Dest: 你今天选错了！

String.Source: You're dead meat!
String.Dest: 你死定了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Think you can upstage me, dragon? I'm worth a hundred dragons!
String.Dest: 还以为能凌驾于我么，你这条死龙？我可做掉过上百条龙了呢！

String.Source: You'll never be bigger than me, giant!
String.Dest: 你永远也不可能比我更大，巨人！

String.Source: You Bretons are like sodding rats!
String.Dest: 你们布莱顿人就像令人讨厌的死耗子！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没！

String.Source: You're bleeding oil, machine!
String.Dest: You're bleeding oil, machine!

String.Source: Die you metal monster!
String.Dest: Die you metal monster!

String.Source: Damn these crawlies!
String.Dest: Damn these crawlies!

String.Source: I'll skin you alive, wolf!
String.Dest: I'll skin you alive, wolf!

String.Source: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!
String.Dest: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!

String.Source: Gods I hate trolls!
String.Dest: Gods I hate trolls!

String.Source: I'll turn you into scrap metal!
String.Dest: I'll turn you into scrap metal!

String.Source: Watch their mouths! The ugly bugs spit poison!
String.Dest: Watch their mouths! The ugly bugs spit poison!

String.Source: Come back down and fight me you coward!
String.Dest: Come back down and fight me you coward!

String.Source: Drop your weapon! You know you want me, wench!
String.Dest: Drop your weapon! You know you want me, wench!

String.Source: It's been a long journey. I could use a drink. And maybe a bite to eat.
String.Dest: It's been a long journey. I could use a drink. And maybe a bite to eat.

String.Source: If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has to offer.
String.Dest: If you don't mind, I'm going to see what this inn has to offer.

String.Source: This inn looks promising.
String.Dest: This inn looks promising.

String.Source: All right, let's see what's on the menu.
String.Dest: All right, let's see what's on the menu.

String.Source: What is that fool over there babbling on about? Does he think I bedded his sister or something? A likely story. I bed a lot of people's sisters.
String.Dest: 那边的蠢货在胡说些什么呢？难道他以为我睡了他的姐妹或者其他人的姐妹？还真有这个可能，因为我睡了一堆别人的姐妹了。

String.Source: Fine by me, imp.
String.Dest: 无所谓，小鬼。

String.Source: {Lute}
String.Dest: {鲁特琴声}

String.Source: {Finish}
String.Dest: {完成}

String.Source: Ha! You call that lute playing? It sounds like two skeevers mixed in with a fork. This is how you play the lute!
String.Dest: 哈！你管那叫弹鲁特琴？听起来就像用一个叉子在两只雪鼠之间来回搅和，这就是你弹的鲁特琴！

String.Source: I most certainly can. I have a poem that was inspired by my days adventuring, and gives ode to something we can all appreciate.
String.Dest: 我肯定办得到。我有首诗就是从自己冒险的日子来的，颂扬的是一些接地气儿的事物。

String.Source: I call it "The common wooden bench."
String.Dest: 我管那叫“普通的木板凳”。

String.Source: Oh Gods, how much longer does this drivel go on?
String.Dest: 哦，我的天呐，多久没这样胡言乱语了？

String.Source: Lovely.
String.Dest: 真可爱。

String.Source: Enough of your babbling. Let's just get this over with.
String.Dest: 别再喋喋不休了，让我们快把这件事了结了。

String.Source: Your former squire. She's already smitten with me.
String.Dest: 你的前侍从。她已经重重地给了我一拳了。

String.Source: Well, I wake up in the morning and I don't have to comb my hair or fiddle with my beard. It's just naturally straight and soft, like a wolf's fur.
String.Dest: 嗯，当我在早上醒来的时候，我不需要梳理我的头发也不需要摆弄我的胡子。它们自然而然地柔顺，就像狼的皮毛一样。

String.Source: For you, I'm guessing it's the same. No makeup, no plucking of hairs, just get up and go.
String.Dest: 我猜你也是一样吧。不梳妆不打扮，前脚起床后脚就出门了。

String.Source: I'm sorry to disappoint you, my lady, but this isn't going to be much of a duel. I doubt the little imp will even show up.
String.Dest: 女士，我很抱歉让你失望了，看起来不会有什么大场面的决斗了。我甚至怀疑那个小鬼会不会现身赴约。

String.Source: Thankfully, it'll just mean more time for you and me to get to know each other.
String.Dest: Thankfully, it'll just mean more time for you and me to get to know each other.

String.Source: You know Amalee, in many ways you remind me of myself. Your beauty is effortless.
String.Dest: 艾米莉，你知道吗，从你身上我能找到许许多多自己的影子。你身上有种与生俱来的美。

String.Source: Funny, I thought I saw a bottle on you the other day.
String.Dest: 有趣，我想几天以前我看到在你身上有个瓶子。

String.Source: I once tried to fuck my own reflection. True story.
String.Dest: I once tried to fuck my own reflection. True story.

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: Every woman that I've been with has told me one thing, and one thing only. That I've got balls of steel.
String.Dest: 每一个曾和我在一起的女人都告诉过我一件事，唯一的一件事。那就是我比钢铁还要生猛。

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: You're the boss. But only because I allow it.
String.Dest: 你是老大。那也是大爷我批准的。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: About time.
String.Dest: 是时候了。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: I'll follow you, and everyone else will follow me.
String.Dest: I'll follow you, and everyone else will follow me.

String.Source: Let's get going then.
String.Dest: 那咱们走啦。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Ungh, yeah what do you want?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: Make it quick.
String.Dest: 快点好吗？

String.Source: Where are we headed? I could use a drink.
String.Dest: 我们要去哪？我想要喝上一杯。

String.Source: We heading out? Let me just get my lute. Never know where you might find an audience.
String.Dest: 我们该出发了吗？让我拿上我的鲁特琴。真不知道你到哪里才能找到一个听众。

String.Source: Some people know me as "Skjarn the Magnificent." It's a little redundant, don't you think?
String.Dest: Some people know me as "Skjarn the Magnificent." It's a little redundant, don't you think?

String.Source: Still here.
String.Dest: 还在这里。

String.Source: Hm...yeah?
String.Dest: Hm...yeah?

String.Source: You mages always think you're the center of everything. You've got it all wrong. You aren't the center of the world, Gilsi. I am.
String.Dest: 你们这些法师总是一切都以自己为中心。你们全错了。世界的中心不是你，歌尔西。是我。

String.Source: Julienne's an assistant innkeeper. Have you ever heard of anything so ridiculous? As if you need to train for that sort of thing.
String.Dest: 朱利安尼是个店主助理。你听过这么搞笑的职称吗？就好像你得通过培训才能做这类事一样。

String.Source: Who do they think they are, bards?
String.Dest: 他们以为他们是谁，吟游诗人吗？

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 我同意！

String.Source: (Laughter)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: (Laughs)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: Speech!
String.Dest: 说话！

String.Source: Funny, I thought I saw a bottle on you the other day.
String.Dest: 有趣，我想几天以前我看到在你身上有个瓶子。

String.Source: I know what I deserve, Zora. Gold. Women. But right now, I'll settle for a warm fire, a sturdy bench, and your hands where I can see them.
String.Dest: 我知道什么是我应得的，佐拉。金子，和女人。但现在，能有一蔟温暖的篝火，一个坚固的凳子，并且把你的手放在我可以看见的地方，我就知足了。

String.Source: Keep your distance Breton. I know how your people operate. First you play nice, but it's only a matter of time before you demand a duel.
String.Dest: 站远点儿布莱顿人。我知道你们这些人玩的哪套。一开始你们会巧言令色，但用不了多久你们就会刀剑相向了。

String.Source: You'd have to make me a general. Give me a really high horse to sit on, so everyone can be inspired by my visage.
String.Dest: 你应该让我做大将军，给我匹高头大马来骑，让大家都记住我的脸。

String.Source: Huzzah!
String.Dest: 好啊！

String.Source: To the Dragonborn, and to you Zora. Excluding that horrible bard, I've never been to a finer gathering!
String.Dest: 向龙裔致敬，还有你，佐拉。排除那个糟糕的吟游诗人不计，我从来都没见过这么赞的聚会！

String.Source: Whatever, Elf. One more insult and I just might ask for a duel.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，精灵。要是你再出言不逊的话，老子就和你决斗。

String.Source: Hey! I heard that!
String.Dest: 嘿！我听说了！

String.Source: I'll take that bet. I'm not sure twenty arrows can even fit on that bulls-eye.
String.Dest: 我打这个赌了。不过我不一定20箭之内就能射穿这野兽的眼睛。

String.Source: Great party. Just pray to Talos I don't leave it.
String.Dest: 超棒的派对。祈祷塔罗斯不要让我离开它。

String.Source: The ladies here must be dying for you to introduce me to them. Make them sweat it out a little longer. I enjoy their anticipation.
String.Dest: 这里的女士们肯定巴不得你把我介绍给她们呢。让她们熬的久一点吧，我挺享受这种瞩目。

String.Source: Is that what goes for a bard these days? I'd show him his place, but I despise duels.
String.Dest: Is that what goes for a bard these days? I'd show him his place, but I despise duels.

String.Source: I think that blacksmith has been giving me the look. You know which one.
String.Dest: I think that blacksmith has been giving me the look. You know which one.

String.Source: Fair warning. If a mad Breton shows up and turns this party into a brawl, don't blame me. I'm just here minding my own business.
String.Dest: 一个忠告。如果一个疯狂的布莱顿人突然现身，然后把这场宴会变成一场斗殴，请别怪我。我只是在做我自己的事。
